<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's Cobbler Business Card Page
</h1>

### The Goal
The goal was to make a static business card page for example entrepreneur. For this example,
I took a Cobbler as an entrepreneur. All content on page is exemplary.

### Tech Stack
- Page Generator: Gatsby
- Style: styled-component
- Info Subpages: Markdown

### Deploy
Page is deploy at a firebase:
https://cobbler-f80ce.firebaseapp.com/

### Graphics
Graphics were taken from free stock pages

Images: 
- https://pixabay.com  
- https://pngio.com/

Favicon: 
- https://icon-icons.com/
